content: >gingham patterning and cross-stitching give these rose-themed accessories a country kitchen feel *yarnspirations* skill level easy **materials ** lily® sugar n cream® 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yd lily® sugar n cream® ombres 56 7 g/2 oz 86 m/95 yd * main color mc hot pink 01740 1 ball * contrast a rose pink 00046 1 ball * contrast b soft ecru 01004 1 ball * contrast c strawberry 00144 1 ball * contrast d hot green 01712 1 ball instructions are included for the cross stitch pot holder /patterns/library/cross-stitch-pot-holder
